name: Air Duelz
description:
Fly your 3d Fighter jet and claim your place in the skies over the pacific. Bring down adversaries in 1v1 simulated duels where you get to make the most important decisions such as when to shoot and the combat maneuver you want to use to bring your enemies to the depths of the deepest ocean.

Fight all kinds of enemies from fictional to national.

Multiplayer mode is almost ready.
